member.name: M:Monkey.Areas.Developers.Controllers.DevelopersController.Logs(Monkey.Model.Models.PagedCollectionParametersModel)
member.remarks: Logger write Log with `message queue` so when create a log, it **near real-time log**. Terms search for `Id`, `Message`, `Level`, `CreatedTime` (with string format is `yyyy'-'MM'-'dd'T'HH':'mm':'ss.FFFFFFFK`, ex: "2017-08-24T00:56:29.6271125+07:00")
